channel.title: Scott Simms
channel.description: Recent news about Scott Simms, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Wishing everyone a happy, healthy, and peaceful Rosh Hashanah this day.

item.title: Mentioned by Windsor Advertiser
item.description:
No need to close parliament, says MP - Grand Falls
For Gander-Bonavista-Grand Falls-Windsor Liberal MP Scott Simms, it's déjà vu all over again. It was a return to December 30 of 2009, when Prime Minister Stephen Harper announced he was “proroguing” Parliament – meaning essentially shutting down the ...

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: @JustinTrudeau Congratulations to two wonderful parents with fantastic news.

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
MP says Other Provinces Struggling with Harper
Bonavista-Gander-Grand Falls-Windsor MP Scott Simms says Premier Kathy Dunderdale is sharing the same frustrations as all Premiers across the country. Dunderdale says she has tried hard to work with the PM, but says the province has taken a lot of cuts ...

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: May I recommend a movie you have to watch!.... "New York, I love you"..... Extremely well done! #classicmovies.

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Feds seeking fix for leaking sunken vessel
The MP for central Newfoundland says the federal government is working toward a way to extract oil from a sunken ship near Change Islands in Notre Dame Bay. Scott Simms, the Liberal MP for Bonavista-Gander-Grand Falls-Windsor, said that research has ...

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
What do do with an Oily Sunken Ship
MP Scott Simms is calling on the provincial government to hold the Harper government to cleaning up the mess near Change Islands. The sunken Manolis L. has been slowly leaking oil for some months now. The vessel sank nearly 30 years ago with an ...

item.title: Mentioned by VOCM
item.description:
Oil May Be Pumped from Sunken Vessel
A proposal before the federal treasury board could see oil pumped from the sunken Manolis L. MP Scott Simms says he was assured by the Environment Minister that a request for funding is in the works. The vessel that sank nearly 30 years ago off Change ...

item.title: Mentioned by mysask.com (press release)
item.description:
Request submitted to Ottawa to pump oil out of sunken vessel off Newfoundland
JOHN'S, N.L. - A Liberal MP says there's a proposal before the federal Treasury Board to have Ottawa pay a company to pump oil out of a sunken vessel that has been leaking off the north coast of Newfoundland for months. Newfoundland MP Scott Simms ...
